A little bit about me

I turned to Web Development after several years working in Loans Operations and trying my hand at teaching English.
So far this appears to be the best professional decision I've made as I love the continuous challenges and learning that comes with Web Development. To see and be part of an evolving project is very rewarding.

General Assembly, London

09/15 - 12/15

I was a student on the Web Development Immersive course for 12 weeks. Learnt programming fundamentals, the basics of product development & front/back-end languages and frameworks.

TEFL English Teacher, Colombia

09/14 - 12/14

During this period I studied to be an English Teacher and an obtained a CELTA certificate at International House (Bogotá). I thenworked for a private company where I visited office workers in Bogotá who needed to learn English. The experience enhanced my self-reflection skills greatly in terms of how well I executed my lesson planning.

Senior Loan Operations Officer, CA-CIB, London

09/10 - 08/14

This role as well as the other Loans Operations jobs I had in the past required a high level in accuracy as I was administering loan requests for large amounts of money and had to make sure that the proper documentation was in place for the booking of the loans. I also had to communicate the loan requests in a timely and accurate fashion with the Treasury Department who would then borrow or lend money on the Stock Market based on the information I provided.

During this role I was able to get an opportunity to work on IT projects from a user perspective, such as helping with the enhancement of the Bank’s in-house loans management tool as well as the loan booking program. This gave me an insight into and interest in software development.

A little more...

In my role with Credit Agricole, I was given the opportunity to learn Spanish and consolidated this further during my time in South America. I hope to further my language skills. I have a keen interest in visual arts and media, especially film. My degree in Media enabled me to enhance my passion for film and culture to be able to appreciate Media from a critical perspective. I am also a fan of music and enjoy playing guitar. When working as part of a band I enjoy the creative process and evolving a song from the initial idea to its realisation.
